sn35.63:1.4: “One who lives alone” (ekavihārī) is also mentioned at SN 21.10:1.5 and Thag 10.2.
sn35.63:1.5: “Partner” is dutiya (“second”), a companion or spouse.
sn35.63:2.8: MS omits mano here in error. It is included in the following round in this Sutta, and in both rounds of the next Sutta. Mano is found in the PTS and BJT editions, which I follow here.
